```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
load("pisa_au.rda")
dataset <- pisa_au
catvars <- c("state", "schtype", "yr", "birthmonth", "gender")
realvars <- c("math", "science", "read")
```

Inputs {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
selectInput('x', 'X', catvars)
selectInput('y', 'Y', realvars)
selectInput('color', 'Color', c('None', catvars))
```

Outputs
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Plots

```{r}
dataset <- reactive({
  pisa_au
})

renderPlot({
  p <- ggplot(pisa_au, aes_string(x=input$x, y=input$y)) + geom_boxplot()
  
  if (input$color != 'None')
    p <- p + aes_string(fill=input$color)

  print(p)
})
```
